attributes.additional_details: Razwan Ali anjam is the father of the kidnapped child Atiya wilkinson who was taken to Lahore and hidden away from her mother in the uk for 3 years, he refused to tell anybody where she was and told her mother she would never see the child again, as a result of his non compliance to British law by not revealing the the whereabouts of atiya he has been imprisoned for 3 years so our taxs have paid for that..Lahore was good enough for his daughter so it's good enough for him..let's keep this little girl safe and remove her father back to Pakistan.
